department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Jim has recently taught CSC-200, GPH-205, CSC-298, IT-130, IT-201, CSC-376/394, CSC-211, CSC-255, ECT-250, IS-315, and CSC-210. His research is centered on optimizing online learning through the use of open web tools and techniques. Students: Jim is available for e-office hours every day except Sunday from 9 AM to 9 PM via text or voice at (872) 205-0642 or FaceTime or Skype at jjanossy@gmail.com or ordinary e-mail to jjanossy@depaul.edu.
